
```{r}
merged_oz <- readRDS("../2_output/analysis_file.RDS") %>% 
  mutate(across(C000rac:CS02wac, ~if_else(is.na(.), 0, .)))
```


```{r}
mod1 <- lm(C000rac ~ year_fact + post_treat + treatment, data = merged_oz)
summary(mod1)

mod2 <- lm(C000wac ~ treatment*post + year_fact, data = merged_oz)
summary(mod2)
```
